metadata.title: CVE-2021-43313 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in upx, during the variable'bucket' points to an inaccessible address. The issue is being triggered inthe function PackLinuxElf32::invert_pt_dynamic at p_lx_elf.cpp:1688.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
